overview:
David is a digital media veteran with over 15 years of business development and operational experience with web services companies. He specializes in developing sales, organizational and operational strategies for entrepreneurs and helping build the necessary partnerships for success.

David is a managing partner at Metamorphic Ventures in New York City. David joined Metamorphic after eight years at Google where he helped to open Googleâ€™s New York office and was on the founding team that launched Googleâ€™s advertising monetization strategy and execution. Pursuant to helping hire and structure the regional sales teams, he co-founded Google’s Vertical Markets Group. David was responsible for building and managing an all-star team that provided marketers and publishers with industry specific expertise. The team was engineered to have cross-functional responsibility; interacting with product, engineering, public relations, and marketing, as well as acting as representation of sales and customers in key businesses such as AdWords, AdSense, and Offline Media Syndication. David and his team worked with Fortune 1000 companies as well as the top global advertising agencies. David was also a leader on Google’s hiring and culture committees and was responsible for the hiring of many of Google’s sales and business leaders.

David started his digital media career in business development roles with start-ups Snowball and Adsmart, and so he understands first-hand the challenges that start-ups encounter. He is actively involved in helping young companies with monetization strategy, business development, traffic acquisition, hiring, and corporate culture development.

David is a member of New York Angels and has invested in and advised a number of startups, including music startup Amie Street, helping the company secure a funding round from Amazon (AMZN).

milestones.description: David Hirsch joined Metamorphic Ventures as a Managing Partner.
